Description:
Job Role: The function of the Welfare Officer is to address grievances of employees and follow up with the respective team to close within a limited turnaround time. Handle employee welfare by providing necessary assistance in the development of employees and making a better workforce. Apply policies and procedures to provide effective employee relations and encourage harmonious industrial relationsKEY RESPONSIBILITIES:  Overall responsibility in ensuring welfare activities for employees are effectively managed and implemented
Handle employee complaints, counseling, and grievances.
Identify and address issues, concerns, the root cause of an employee's behavior, and any matter that needs escalation to management.
Visit all Dulsco employee accommodations and camps to conduct welfare-related activities
Handle resignation cases to understand the reason and possibility of retaining a separating employee
Provide support to Operations team in handling late leave return cases and disciplinary cases
Initiate disciplinary actions, including recommendations of warning, suspension or termination
Maintain welfare-related MIS, reports, and updates.
Deliver employee welfare-related trainings
Ensure necessary assistance and care is given to employees who have undergone medical treatment and residing at our accommodations and coordinate with DMC on the same
Engage idle employees through various activities, including trainingOther responsibilities may maybe assigned from time to timeTraining and InductionAccommodation VisitsReports, and PresentationsSeparation and exit interviewsSkills
Skills:
MSW/ MA Sociology 
Prior experience in welfare will be preferable
Training multicultural groups

Language Proficiency (mandatory): English (Read, Write, Speak), Hindi and other local languages will be an added advantage
IT Proficiency: MS Office (Word, Excel)
Valid UAE driving license
